Dead by Daylight is a game I had previously enjoyed for years on console, and now continue to enjoy on PC.
It's the most fun to play with friends, but even solo can bring out some enjoyable experiences (That being if you don't take potential bad plays and rude endgame chats of others to heart, but that's not the game's fault to begin with).
With new DLC releasing on the regular, smaller events sprinkled in between, archive and daily challenges, and all the different playstyles you'll see from other players, Dead by Daylight is a game that never truly grows stale. 
I would personally call it my favorite multiplayer game currently available for PC.
